Illinois Institute of Technology
Technology Center
Chicago 16
OFFICE OF THE VICE PRESIDENT
Mr. Harry J. Skornia,
Executive Secretary,
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
Gregory Hall, Univ. of Illinois,
Urbana, Illinois*
Dear Harry,
I want to congratulate you on the
excellently prepared and interesting NAEB headquarter*s
report that you distributed to the members last week.
I am so impressed that I am writing you after reading
it ’’from cover to cover”.
I am awfully sorry that I did not get
to the National Convention this week. I thought that
it would be possible, and then at the last moment de¬
cided I would not attempt it because of many other
obligations with which I am having difficulty keeping
abreast. / /
Sincerely yours,
Stewart s. Howe
JP
